<title level="1" right="Rules">[Dedicated Attendant 3rd](/Rules.aspx?ID=1475)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 64

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
At 3rd level in a branch, if you have completed your Perquisite, you have proven your commitment to a sufficient degree that your branch promotes and supports you as an affiliated attendant. The first time you reach this level in a branch, you gain the [Magaambyan Attendant Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1102) feat as a bonus feat (even if you haven't taken enough feats with a previous archetype to take another dedication feat).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
